db:abstract.db:para: The mapType type holds information about a map type.
This type was introduced in QtLocation 5.5.

db:listitem.db:para: mapType is part of QML Maps Plugin

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This includes the map type's name and description, the style and a flag to indicate if the map type is optimized for mobile devices (mobile).

db:section.db:title: [since QtLocation 5.10] cameraCapabilities : CameraCapabilities
db:section.db:para: This property holds the camera capabilities for this map type.
This property was introduced in QtLocation 5.10.

db:section.db:title: description : string
db:section.db:para: This read-only property holds the description of the map type as a single formatted string.

db:section.db:title: [since QtLocation 5.10] metadata : VariantMap
db:section.db:para: This property holds optional, extra metadata related to a specific map type. The content of this property is entirely plugin-specific.
This property was introduced in QtLocation 5.10.

db:section.db:title: mobile : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether the map type is optimized for the use on a mobile device.
Map types for mobile devices usually have higher constrast to counteract the effects of sunlight and a reduced color for improved readability.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: This read-only property holds the name of the map type as a single formatted string.

db:section.db:title: [since QtLocation 5.4] night : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether the map type is optimized for use at night.
Map types suitable for use at night usually have a dark background.
This property was introduced in QtLocation 5.4.

db:section.db:title: style : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This read-only property gives access to the style of the map type.

db:listitem.db:para: MapType.SatelliteMapDay - A map with day-time satellite imagery.
MapType.SatelliteMapNight - A map with night-time satellite imagery.
MapType.HybridMap - A map with satellite imagery and street information.
MapType.PedestrianMap - A street map suitable for pedestriants.
MapType.CarNavigationMap - A street map suitable for car navigation.
MapType.CycleMap - A street map suitable for cyclists.
